bug.author: richardliaw
bug.summary: [tune] The search algorithms generate more trials than necessary
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
I was under the impression that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/10802>#10802</denchmark-link> should avoid producing too many trials before resources are ready. However, on master, it seems like many trials are generated (especially when using search algorithms) before resources are ready, and this happens far into the experiment. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/krfricke>@krfricke</denchmark-link>
